name: 3D tic-tac-toe (old retro games)
description:
3D tic-tac-toe is a 3D board game played by 2 or 3 players. Each player can be human or computer (A.I.)

How to play

Drag your mouse or swipe your finger on screen to move the green cube around. Click on the grid to place your sign into the green cube. The green cube is the place selector and no matter where you click, your sign will always be placed inside the green cube.

3D tic-tac-toe was written in JavaScript with the p5.js library. Coding by Panos Tsikogiannopoulos. Contact: pantsik2@gmail.com
